description: Weighing just grams and packing smaller than a grapefruit, the Cerium Vest performs as a minimalist’s alpine midlayer or standalone in cool, dry conditions. Responsibly-sourced 850 fill down – with Coreloft™ synthetic utilized in areas prone to moisture – provides premium insulation, and the recycled 15D Arato™ nylon outer is light and durable. Streamlined in its design, it layers comfortably under a shell and easily fits into its included stuff sack for compact transport.<br><br>Redesigned with a roomier fit in the chest, reverse coil front zipper and TPU pulls for a cleaner profile and improved durability.
name: Cerium Vest - Womens

specs.value: 850 fill European white goose down - RDS down
Arato™ 20 - 100% Nylon - 60% bio-derived material, FC0 DWR
